title: Goldman Warns Clients About Outside Law Firm’s Data Breach
description: Goldman Sachs Group Inc. warned investors in some of its alternative investment funds that their data may have been exposed in a breach at one of the bank’s law firms.

title: Intel Shares Fall on Reports Nvidia to Halt Chipmaking Tests | Bloomberg Tech 12/24/2025
description: Bloomberg’s Katie Greifeld examines Intel as shares fall after reports emerge that Nvidia may be hitting pause on testing Intel’s chip production process. Plus, the Trump administration gets the go-ahead to move forward with a $100,000 fee on new H-1B visa applications. And Tesla faces renewed scrutiny over car doors, with the company confronting a new probe by the NHTSA. (Source: Bloomberg)

title: Tech’s 'Boring' Names See Gains
description: Ipek Ozkardeskaya, Swissquote senior market analyst, details why tech memory names have seen a robust rally and outlines the outlook for 2026. She joins Katie Greifeld on “Bloomberg Tech.” (Source: Bloomberg)
